definition: to conceal from/to keep (sb) in the dark
to conceal/to hide (a taboo subject)/to cover up the truth
to conceal or deceive in a report/to falsify by over- or underreporting
to cross the sea by a trick (idiom)/to achieve one's aim by underhanded means
to deceive one's superiors and bully one's subordinates (idiom)
truth to tell/to be quite honest...
name of a state and its people in Shangdong in late Spring and Autumn period
to cover up (a matter that should be reported to the authorities)

sentences.english: He is a very good husband and never runs around on his wife.
sentences.chinese: 他是个模范丈夫，从来不会瞒着妻子做一切事情。

sentences.english: She a heart deceive I am this stuff, should merely I don't know, this equitable runs without a track.
sentences.chinese: 她一心瞒着我此事，只当我不知，这才跑的无影无踪。

sentences.english: Indeed, anything untoward was now kept from James.
sentences.chinese: 的确，现在一切不顺心的事都小心瞒著詹姆士。

sentences.english: Lucy had done that morning, but she palmed him off with some story or other.
sentences.chinese: 求道露西那干些什，她套假话把瞒去。

sentences.english: I knew I would eventually have to tell him.
sentences.chinese: 我心里清楚，瞒不了的，总有一天要告诉他。

sentences.english: The next day, he went to the bar without letting his colleague know.
sentences.chinese: 第二天，他瞒着同事悄悄来到了那个酒吧。

sentences.english: The situation of affairs in the Longbourn family could not be long a secret.
sentences.chinese: 浪搏恩这家人家的事瞒也瞒不了多久。

sentences.english: The situation of affairs in the Longbourn family could not be long a secret.
sentences.chinese: 浪搏恩这家人家的事瞒也瞒不了多久。

sentences.english: He went there unbeknown to me.

sentences.chinese: 我的男朋友瞒着我拈花惹草。

sentences.english: My intuition told me that he had covered something to me.
sentences.chinese: 直觉告诉我，安杰有事瞒着我。

sentences.english: ShaoYang deceive embroidery with iron meet young tiger from clouds, and embroidered cloud found.
sentences.chinese: 邵扬瞒着绣云不时与铁彪见面，终被绣云发现。

sentences.english: It's a deception, as far as I can discover.
sentences.chinese: 一个人的骗术纵使能瞒天过海，却瞒不了自己的良心。

sentences.english: Brother to work honestly, deceiving his wife often living on sisters relief.
sentences.chinese: 弟弟不务正业，瞒着妻子常靠姐姐的救济过日子。

sentences.english: I thought I could conceal the lives of people still can not escape their own camouflage heart.
sentences.chinese: 以为可以瞒的住众人的伪装却始终逃不过自己的心。

sentences.english: That he overburnt to me implied he had something hidden from me.
sentences.chinese: 他对我过分的热情说明他有什么事在瞒着我。

as matters stand/things having reached this stage
